Name: Last Day: Zombie Survival VR
About the game: Last Day - Zombie Survival is a VR first person action shooter where players immerse themselves in a new world where the undead have taken over. You must survive the horde of undead using an arsenal of weapons in a story driven campaign. A stranger, who awakens in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discovers they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious unknown person. Waking up in an undisclosed location in an unknown room , they are trapped in a building. Given random tools with riddles hidden around the room. Wondering who could have done this, there are clues to who might have done it. The question is not just who but why would an unknown person leave them in a building. they must work to get out or die...can they survive in the game or die trying? The premise of the Last Day-Zombie Survival is that an unknown person has trapped the player in the chosen area , and the player has limited time to escape. Thankfully Every room the player can go into contains a certain amount of monsters. The main goal of the game is to kill as many monsters as possible and escape from the building. 1. Full campaign with story driven gameplay - they are trapped in a building and oven random tools with riddles hidden around the room as well as player has limited time to escape 2. Combat - Survive with a variety of weapons such as pistols, and two handed weapons (assault rifles, shot guns, etc.). 3. Fight - with the horde of zombies 4. Creep through and escape from ruined asylum
